targets.query: SELECT mean("P") as P, mean("P_prev") as P_prev, mean("P_raw") as P_raw, mean("P_filt") as P_filt FROM "mppt" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), device fill(null)
SELECT mean("E") as E , mean("E_today") as E_today FROM "mppt" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), device fill(null)
SELECT mean("I") as I, mean("U") as U, mean("P") as P FROM "mppt" WHERE ("device" = 'esp32_proto_mppt') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("I") as I, mean("U") as U, mean("P") as P FROM "mppt" WHERE ("device" = 'esp32_proto_mppt') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
